mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.content AS "content", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_config( id, content, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{content}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
